title: Enhancing AI Practical Skills: Experiential Economics Learning Through Photographs

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can observe economic phenomena through photographs and explain economic concepts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can write a 3,000-character photo essay on economic issues based on photographs they have taken.
Learners can plan and operate an economic photo exhibition by incorporating peer feedback and propose policy improvements based on it.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
